title: Impeach Pelosi and cohorts
text:
ANALYSIS/OPINION:

It has become necessary to impeach House Speaker Nancy Pelosi and a long list of others on the grounds of the obvious mental and moral incompetence that has led to dereliction of duty and deliberate, fanatical interference with the smooth functioning of our government.

This malfeasance is real, ugly and becoming intolerable in a country which once supported truth and justice for all, without exception. Our tolerance for vendettas has been exhausted. Those who cannot accept the results of the presidential election should be forced out of government and be held responsible for the trouble they have caused. In football there are penalties for interference, and there should be in law, too.

President Trump knows our problems. He knows how to fix them and he fixes them. He loves this country and trusts in God. It is time to deal seriously with people whose intentions toward him and the country are worse than negative and getting worse by the minute. We have a whole country to care about and want to pursue our happiness in peace, free of this unworthy pestilence (Nancy and friends).

ELIZABETH WARD NOTTRODT

Author, “Truth: The Golden Heresy”

Baltimore
